title: Brutal moment two men brawl over a POKIE MACHINE in a Queensland pub
text:
A violent brawl has broken out between two men in the gaming section of a pub.

The bizarre fight broke out inside the Royal Hotel in Beenleigh, Queensland, as a group gathered around a row of pokie machines.

The circumstances of how the fight began is unclear but footage shows one of the men in a camouflage jumper telling a group of people to 'f*** off away from us'.

He then pushes a man wearing khaki-coloured pants, who rams his head into his stomach and tackles him down.

The incident, believed to be filmed at the Royal Hotel in Beenleigh, shows a man headbutting the stomach of another, before taking him down

An employee is seen struggling to break up the brawl.

Another man wearing a green hoodie and is holding a beer attempts to get involved but is pulled away by a woman understood to be his partner.

The woman tries to isolate him as far away from the brawl as possible as he's heard yelling: 'Let me f***en go!', before pushing her away.

He then spots the man filming the entire incident and screams: 'I'll smash your f***ing head in mate, look at this dog, he's filming'.

A man wearing a green hoodie with a beer in one hand tries to intervene in the brawl and punches one of the men.

The footage was uploaded on Facebook and quickly gained over 300,000 views.

'Guess that's what happens when u put ya whole doll (sic) check in the pokies,' one person wrote.

'Dude watching too much UFC. Goes for takedown for no reason,' another wrote.

'King hit Kingsley in the green couldn't strike a match,' wrote a third.

Daily Mail Australia contacted the Royal Hotel but they declined to comment on the incident.

Queensland Police said no arrests or charges have been made in relation to the incident.
description: The bizarre fight broke out inside the Royal Hotel in Beenleigh, Queensland, as a group gathered around a row of pokie machines.
authors: Paula Ahillon For Daily Mail Australia
